page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT Questionnaires were sent out to children attending the participating schools and who lived within the D/Block. Types of employment recorded_(mostly in the tertiary sector)_ Secretarial, Teachers,Company Directors,Public Employees,Journalists,Financiers, Computer Programmers,Gardeners,Product Managers,Catering,Central Heating Engineers,Estate Agents,Car Dealers, Press Officer,Administrator,Labourer, Soil Investigator,Travel Agent,Cashier ,Telegraphist,Receptionist,Electrician ,Lecturer,Butcher,Technical Officer, Tyre Manager,Sheet Metal Worker, Underwriter,Painter/Decorator,Wine Merchant.
